events.title: Baccalauréat
events.details: I obtained sciences baccalauréat speciality Biology and Geology with highest honors

events.title: Champollion High School Entrance
events.details: Intensive preparation for entrance exams to leading engineering schools. Provides a general scientific knowledge. Mathematics : Linear Algebra, Differential Analysis, Geometry Physics : Electromagnetism, Fluid Mechanics, Optics, Electronics, Thermodynamics, Mechanics Chemistry: Thermochemistry, Organic chemistry

events.title: Concours grandes écoles
events.details: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) equivalent. I was admissible at Centrale-Supelec, Mines-Telecom and CCP concourses, and I finally chose Telecom SudParis as engineering school.

events.title: Telecom SudParis Entrance
events.details: Master of Engineering (M.Eng.) Telecom SudParis is a leading engineering school member of Mines-Telecom institute and Paris-Saclay University. The engineer's grade cursus is divided in four parts: Core courses (3 semestres), where general knowledge is provided in the following fields: - Mathematics, statistics and data analytics - Software Programmation (Java, C/C++) - Electronic, low-level programming - TCP/IP Networks - Electromagnetism, radiofrequency transmissions Optional courses (chosen by students) to discover new fields (1/2 semestre). I chose the following courses: - Low-level programming of autonomous systems - A.I., formal methods and genetic algorithms Specialised courses in Embedded Systems, and Internet of Things (3/2 semestres): - Real time programming - Radio Frequency Identification - Sensors micro-electronics A final 6-month internship

events.title: Student Office Website Development
events.details: I developped the website of my team during the student office campaign. I used a Symfony-based PHP backend with a PostGreSQL database. For the front-end, I only used HTML5/CSS3 and Ajax request with jQuery

events.title: IT Teacher @ Centro de Formacion Integral para el Trabajo
events.details: We organized IT workshop in a secondary school in Medellin suburbs. We taught class of web development (HTML/CSS and PHP/SQL) and Unix-based operating systems (Debian based linux distributions) in Spanish.

events.title: IT Technician @ Escuela de Ingeneria de Antioquia
events.details: Maintenance of the University Intranet with the IT department. Organization of conferences and classes about open source technologies.

events.title: Machine Learning MOOC - Stanford University
events.details: I followed a course of Machine learning on coursera. We learnt several technics of supervised and unsupervised machine learning, including Support Vector Machines, Neural Networks, Logistic and Linear regression K-Means, and Random Forests

events.title: Entrepreneurship Competition
events.details: With two students in management and two other students in IT engineering, we particpate to a start-up creation challenge. We had a week to imagine a innovating company and work on the technical and financial aspects. We have done a 8-minutes thats explain the need that the company fills, the business model, and sell our project to investors. Our idea was to create a meta search engine of carpooling, train, bus and plane tickets to find the better price and recollect massive datasets on consumer preferences for analytics. Our project was qualified in semi finals (16 projects on 116).

events.title: Full stack developer @ Linagora
events.details: Internship in Web Development. We built an open source enterprise social network OpenPaas using a MEAN stack (Mongodb, ExpressJS, AngularJS, NodeJS). I learnt a lot about team development and professional Agile workflow, using JIRA for bug tracking, STASH for code management and JENKINS for continuous integration. View project source code on github: https://github.com/linagora/openpaas-esn

events.title: Kaggle SF crime classification
events.details: Data-science competition which aim to predict crimes category in San Francisco based on a 12 years dataset
